description:
With decades of combined experience, the attorneys at Emerson Straw are dedicated to representing catastrophic injury victims in St. Augustine, Florida. Our law office is extremely effective in pursuing justice and compensation for clients. Both of our attorneys, Matthew Emerson and Wesley Straw, have been recognized by Martindale-Hubbell with the rating of AV Preeminent* for their legal prowess and commitment to ethics. Additionally, Mr. Straw is recognized in Super Lawyers and Rising Stars lists.

Our law office has a long track record of success. Whether we are handling a case involving a motor vehicle accident or medical malpractice, we stop at nothing to seek compensation for damages while providing personalized attention to clients. In our history, we have recovered millions in settlements and verdicts. This includes traumatic brain injury and wrongful death claims brought against large corporations and insurers.

In addition to car crashes and medical malpractice, we represent victims of trucking, boating, motorcycle and industrial accidents. We also handle cases involving hazardous premises and shaken baby syndrome. Our attorneys are experienced with a wide array of injuries such as spinal cord, head, internal, neurological and orthopedic trauma.

We invite prospective clients from greater Pinellas and Pasco counties to arrange a free initial consultation at our law office. Emerson Straw represents people with cases in cities of Tampa and St. Petersburg, and the metropolitan areas of Jacksonville and Clearwater.

* AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review RatingTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
